arm_group.description: Anyone who has received a NiCord® transplant, completed study specific follow up, and has signed the consent for this study.

brief_summary.textblock:
This is an observational study that will monitor patient's clinical outcomes.  A patient can
      enroll in the NiCord® Long Term Follow Up Protocol only after the informed consent has been
      signed, and he/she has completed the study specific follow-up.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long Term Follow Up Protocol for NiCord Patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria

          -  Anyone who has received a NiCord® transplant, completed study specific follow up, and
             has signed the consent for this study.

        Exclusion Criteria

          -  None

clinical_study.official_title: Long Term Follow Up for Patients Who Have Received Allogeneic Stem Cell Transplantation of NiCord®, Umbilical Cord Blood-derived Ex Vivo Expanded Stem and Progenitor Cells

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: long term sustained engraftment of NiCord® transplantation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective
